report.title: Show my insect species data for UKPoMS
report.description: Show my insect species data for UKPoMS.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional conf on conf.id = o.id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id = o.taxa_taxon_list_id and cttl.taxon_list_id in (#taxon_list_ids#) JOIN cache_samples_functional csf on csf.id = o.sample_id AND csf.input_form != '#input_form_to_ignore#' JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf ON snf.id=csf.id LEFT JOIN locations l on l.id=csf.location_id and l.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND ((trim('#year_sort_order#') = '0' OR '#year_sort_order#'='<please select>' OR csf.date_end >= CAST((0-(#year_sort_order#)::int)::text || '-01-01' as date)) AND (trim('#year_sort_order#') = '0' OR '#year_sort_order#'='<please select>' OR csf.date_start <= CAST((0-(#year_sort_order#)::int)::text || '-12-31' as date))) AND ('#specimen_code_param#' = '' OR conf.attrs_json->>('#specimen_code_occ_attr_id#') like '%' || '#specimen_code_param#' || '%') AND o.created_by_id=#current_user_id# #idlist#

param.name: current_user_id
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: specimen_code_occ_attr_id
param.description: ID of the occurrence attribute that holds the specimen code.

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available

param.name: year_sort_order
param.description: Select a year, or leave blank for all years

param.name: specimen_code_param
param.description: Specimen code to search for. Leave blank for all.

param.name: sex_occ_attr_id
param.description: ID of the occurrence attribute that holds the sex.

param.name: identified_by_occ_attr_id
param.description: ID of the occurrence attribute that holds the identifier.

param.name: taxon_list_ids
param.description: Only include occurrences in these taxon_list_ids.

param.name: man_location_id
param.description: Location ID for Isle of Mann.

param.name: input_form_to_ignore
param.description: Input form to ignore data from.

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when csf.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else csf.input_form end
